```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
av <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/avengers/avengers.csv",
               stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
View(av)
```

```{r}
temp = av %>% gather(Time, Death, c("Death1", "Death2", "Death3", "Death4", "Death5"))
temp = temp %>% gather(Time, Return, c("Return1", "Return2", "Return3", "Return4", "Return5"))
wantednames = c("URL", "Name.Alias", "Appearances", "Current.", "Gender", "Probationary.Introl", "Full.Reserve.Avengers.Intro", "Year", "Years.since.joining", "Honorary", "Notes", "Time", "Death", "Return")
fin = temp %>% subset(select = wantednames)
fin$Time = fin$Time %>% parse_number()
View(fin)
```
